```{r whichPosts, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
posts       <- list.files(pattern = "\\.html")
posts.files <- list.files(pattern = "\\.Rmd")
posts.meta  <- lapply(posts.files, rmarkdown::yaml_front_matter)
names(posts.meta) <- posts

dates <- as.Date(sapply(posts.meta, function(x) x$date), format = "%m-%d-%Y")
names(dates) <- posts
dates.sorted <- sort(dates)

thisFile <- "ggloop_intro.html"
whereFile <- names(dates.sorted) %in% thisFile
prevFile <- names(dates.sorted)[which(whereFile) - 1]
nextFile <- names(dates.sorted)[which(whereFile) + 1]

assembleMenu <- function(x, y) {
  homeLink <- "[HOME](/)"
  prevLink <- if(!is.na(x) && length(x)) paste0("[PREVIOUS](", x, ")") else "PREVIOUS"
  nextLink <- if(!is.na(y) && length(y)) paste0("[NEXT](", y, ")") else "NEXT"
  
  paste(homeLink, prevLink, nextLink, sep = " | ")
}

menu <- assembleMenu(prevFile, nextFile)

```
